Enter Cutoff Period (YYYYMM) or (NONE) Text PPDField01 1 6 R Enter a Valid Period (YYYYMM) or (NONE)
Enter Cutoff Date (MM/DD/YY) or (NONE) DropDown PPDField02 6 8 R Enter a Valid Date or (NONE) H NONE NONE
Enter Division No. or (ALL) Text PPDField03 1 3 R Enter a valid division # or (ALL)
Sort 1-Cust/Dv 2-Dv/Cust 3-SR/Dv 4-Dv/SR DropDown PPDField04 3 1 R Sort By: 1-Cust/Div, 2-Div/Cust, 3-Slsrp/Div, 4-Div/Slsrp H 1,2,3,4 BY CUSTOMER,BY DIVISON BY CUSTOMER,BY SALESREP,BY DIVISION BY SALESREP
Enter 1-Specific Dates or 2-31/61/91/121 DropDown PPDField05 3 1 R Enter (1) to choose your own dates or (2) for default dates H 1,2 1,2
Summarize By: 1-Invoice, 2-Job, 3-Slsrep DropDown PPDField06 1 1 R Enter a valid option H 1,2,3 1,2,3
